shef.mt.features.util

Class FeatureLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • shef.mt.features.util.FeatureLoader

  • public class FeatureLoader
extends java.lang.Object
    A FeatureLoader is responisble for instantiating Feature objects from a list of feature indeces

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FeatureLoader(java.lang.String xmlFile)
      instantiates the FeatureLoader from an XML feature configuration file

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Feature createFeature(org.w3c.dom.Element node)
      Instantiates a Feature object from the XML Element that describes it
      java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,Feature> getAllFeatures()
      Returns all features
      Feature getFeature(java.lang.String index)
      Returns a Feature by index
      void loadFeatures()
      Creates a list of features by inspecting the XML feature configuration file and creating a Feature object from each node
